RelatedSentence: According to Iran 's Young Journalists Club 's report released on May 19 , Iran 's Culture Ministry 's Deputy in Parliamentary Affairs Hossein Noushabadi has criticized Leila Hatami 's act in the Cannes Festival as against the Iranian chastity .
The Iranian actress shook hands with and kissed the 83 - year - old Cannes President Gilles Jacob on the red carpet .
